description: Many die-hard sprout haters will love this sweet and meaty treatment of the vegetables.
name: Brussels Sprouts With Pancetta & Chestnuts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g chestnuts, cooked, peeled and roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pan of salted water to the boil. Cook the Brussels sprouts for 4-5 minutes, until they are just cooked, then drain well and refresh them under cold water. Drain again and set aside.
In a wok, heat the butter and olive oil. When the butter has melted, add the pancetta and cook over a medium heat for 3-4 minutes, until it is crispy. Add the chestnuts and cook for a further minute.
Add the Brussels sprouts and cook for a further 2-3 minutes, until heated through, adding a little more butter if necessary and seasoning well with pepper (not salt as the pancetta is quite salty).
